# AVAudioSourceNode

**Class**

An object that supplies audio data.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVAudioSourceNode
```

## Overview

The `AVAudioSourceNode` class allows for supplying audio data for rendering through [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSourceNodeRenderBlock]. It’s a convenient method for delievering audio data instead of setting the input callback on an audio unit with `kAudioUnitProperty_SetRenderCallback`.

## Creating an Audio Source Node

- **AVAudioSourceNodeRenderBlock**: A block that supplies audio data to an audio source node.
- **init(renderBlock:)**: Creates an audio source node with a block that supplies audio data.
- **init(format:renderBlock:)**: Creates an audio source node with the audio format and a block that supplies audio data.

## Rendering

- **Building a signal generator**: Generate audio signals using an audio source node and a custom render callback.
- **Performing offline audio processing**: Add offline audio processing features to your app by enabling offline manual rendering mode.
- **AVAudioSinkNode**: An object that receives audio data.

## Inherits From

- AVAudioNode

## Conforms To

- AVAudio3DMixing
- AVAudioMixing
- AVAudioStereoMixing
- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
